Silo: MAD and Mr. Gibs released for iPhone

May 26, 2010 – Two new Plasmaworks games are available in the iTunes App Store: Silo: Mutual Assured Destruction and Mr. Gibs vs the Deathatron, both published by EpicTilt.

Silo is an arcade RTS that could be described as Missile Command meets Galcon. Developed by Riverman Media, Silo is a AAA single player iPhone title that features gorgeous graphics, vibrant sounds, and an extensive campaign scenario.  Send out transports to take over territories, build defense systems, upgrade your arsenal, and launch nuclear missiles!!

Mr Gibs vs the Deathatron is a fun and frantic arcade game with simple controls and addictive challenge.  As the Deathatron launches all manner of weapons at you, just tap to stand in a safe spot.  As the action heats up, only one thing is certain: you’re going to die.  But how long can you last?  The game features national and global scoreboards for bragging rights!

For more information:

  • http://plasmaworks.com/silo_mad
  • http://plasmaworks.com/mr_gibs
